consultantTemplates.description: Comprehensive consultant services and deliverables template. Services are ongoing activities/work performed. Deliverables are tangible outputs/documents produced.

standardPhases.description: Standard phase definitions aligned with Australian practice. All disciplines map to these where applicable.

feasibility.name: Feasibility / Pre-Design
feasibility.description: Initial assessment, site analysis, constraints identification

schematic_design.name: Schematic Design / Concept
schematic_design.description: Concept development, preliminary design, initial costings

masterStages.description: 5 master stages for project delivery - consolidates the 8 standard phases into a simplified structure

feasibility.description: Development viability assessment for potential sites

retirement-living.name: Retirement Living
retirement-living.description: Independent living units, aged care villages

fitout.name: Fitout
fitout.description: Interior fitout of existing base building
